Name: ASIA CARGO NETWORK SDN BHD

Name: INGRESS INDUSTRIAL (MALAYSIA) SDN BHD

Name: Sarawak PetChem Sdn Bhd
Purpose of Financing: Cancellation of remaining balance of USD21.0 million pursuant to the Bank's allocation of USD19.0 million against the original approved limit of US40.0 million

Name: SMH RAIL SDN BHD
Purpose of Financing:
To approve Term Financing-i of RM17,000,000 to purchase of 
equipment and machineries (Facility 7 Request) [Sub-limit : Letter of Credit-i (LC-i) of RM17,000,000 to facilitate purchase of equipments and machineries above]

Name: SMH RAIL SDN BHD
Purpose of Financing: To part finance the raw materials, overhead expenses, working capital and other expenses related to its contract with Mumbai Metropolitan Regional Development Authority (Mumbai Monorail Project)

Name: TABCO FOOD SERVICES SDN BHD
